name: My Zoo - Vet Practice 3D
synopsis: Be part of an unbelievably wild 3D experience! Care for animals you love so much in the biggest zoo you can imagine. Examine elephants with the stethoscope, help giraffes with sore throats or perform dental treatments on lions – all in a fabulous 3D view! - Look after super cute animals from all over the world: Lion, Tiger, Polar Bear, Chimpanzee, Elephant, Giraffe, Orang-Utan, Seal and Penguin - Use the interactive options of your Nintendo 3DS™: give medicine, palpate, take a listen with the stethoscope, care for wounds, rub with ointment, pull hurting teeth, take the temperature and much more - Get in your off-road vehicle and drive to your patients the shortest way - Take serious cases to specialized compounds for treatment, feeding, brushing and stroking - Don’t forget to anesthetize lion, tiger and polar bear carefully, before examining them - Learn all about the animals home regions Savannah, Rain Forest and the Polar Region - Expand the compounds with climbing trees, shelters, troughs and toys - Collect Nintendo Play Coins and exchange them for in-game currency
